def min_changes(nums, k)
    differences = Hash.new { |hash, key| hash[key] = [] }
    max_values = []

    half_size = nums.size / 2
    (0...half_size).each do |i|
      a = nums[i]
      b = nums[nums.size - i - 1]
      diff = (a - b).abs
      max_val = [a, b, k - a, k - b].max

      differences[diff] << max_val
      max_values << max_val
    end

    answer = nums.size
    max_values.sort!

    differences.each do |diff, values|
      operations_count = max_values.bsearch_index { |val| val >= diff } || max_values.size
      operations_count = operations_count * 2 + (half_size - operations_count)

      values.each do |max_val|
        if max_val < diff
          operations_count -= 2
        else
          operations_count -= 1
        end
      end

      answer = [answer, operations_count].min
    end

    answer
  end
